mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO myh_hospital_doctor( `doctor_id`, `doctor_name`, `doctor_image`, `doctor_title`, `doctor_good_at`, `hospital_id`, `hospital_name`, `department_id`, `department_name`, `rank`, `area_code`, `area_name` )VALUES (#{doctorId},#{doctorName},#{doctorImage},#{doctorTitles},#{doctorGoodAt}, #{hospitalId},#{hospitalName},#{departmentId},#{departmentName},#{rank},#{areaCode},#{areaName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE doctor_id = VALUES(doctor_id), doctor_name = VALUES(doctor_name), doctor_image = VALUES(doctor_image), doctor_title = VALUES(doctor_title), doctor_good_at = VALUES(doctor_good_at), hospital_id = VALUES(hospital_id), hospital_name = VALUES(hospital_name), department_id = VALUES(department_id), department_name = VALUES(department_name), rank = VALUES(rank), area_code = VALUES(area_code), area_name = VALUES(area_name);
